div.p: Telegram to Baron Sir F von Mueller K.C.M.G

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Telegram received on my return to Sydney Will use best endeavours with our Ministry.
MS annotation: 'In reply to the Baron's telegram recd Apl 4th'. See M to E. Merewether, 4 April 1891 (in this edition as 91-04-04b).
